acupoint.standard_location: 在额部，当两眉头之中间
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the forehead, at the midpoint between the two eyebrows
acupoint.simple_method_en: Exactly midway between the inner ends of the eyebrows.
acupoint.anatomical: 在降眉间肌中；有额动静脉分支；布有滑车上神经分支
functions: 清头明目 (clear head, brighten eyes)
通鼻开窍 (unblock nose, open orifices)
宁心安神 (calm heart, tranquilize spirit)
